Why do you need a 3D avatar
Exactly! You read correctly! Your 3D avatar is the gateway to a groundbreaking future! We want everything to revolve around you!

Immerse yourself in an unprecedented world of digital interaction and use your 3D avatar in areas such as gaming, virtual dressing, online shopping or even hanging out with your friends on social VR!

Your 3D avatar is the "must-have" of the future! Our task is to digitize you and catapult you into a new and multifaceted dimension. To create your 3D avatar, you can easily make an appointment in one of our numerous stores online - and that for free!

VR & AR - unrealistic? - No, not with us!

It is time to give virtual reality your personal touch. Our razor-sharp 3D avatars let you come alive in VR&AR and interact like never before! With our AR function in the 3D GENERATION app, your virtual avatar is projected into the room. Whether Paris, Madrid or London - take a snapshot with your 3D avatar and share it on social media!


3D Your Gaming Avatar
Quivering grandstands, soccer stars and limelight close enough to touch. Let yourself be scanned and play with your personal gamer avatar in your favourite Video-game! With the creation of your 3D avatar you have endless possibilities. Feel the game and be the central hub of the action.

With breathtaking quality and highest precision you will experience an unprecedented gaming experience!

Social Media Avatar
Messenger and Videocalls - snow of yesterday! What the future holds for you is simply phenomenal! In the future or even today you will scan yourself, at one of our locations and use your 3D avatar to meet and interact with your friends! Totally detached from time and space you will meet and experience yourself with your loved ones at different places!

Your 3D avatar is ready to travel with you. This expirience of being so close to each other despite distance will blow you away!

Your animated 3D avatar
Dancer, acrobat or even top athlete? - Be what you want!

In 3D we animate your avatar, just the way you want it. Create Hollywood-ready animations with your own 3D avatar. Thanks to our expertise in rigging, skinning and blend shape, we create animations of the highest quality!
